sentences.en: "We're all talking at the same time." — "Yeah. Sorry."
sentences.cn: “我们俩在同时讲话。”——“噢，抱歉。”

sentences.en: (= once ) I went to a garage sale and bought fifteen books.
sentences.cn: 有一次我去了旧物售卖会，买回15本书。

sentences.en: 1998 was an important year for everyone: a time of change.
sentences.cn: 1998年对所有人来说都是重要的一年：那是个变革的时期。

sentences.en: By golly we can do something about it this time.
sentences.cn: 这次我们确实可以采取行动了。

sentences.en: By the time he's twenty he'll know everyone worth knowing in Washington.
sentences.cn: 到20岁时，他就会认识华盛顿所有值得认识的人。

sentences.en: close relationships established over a long period of time
sentences.cn: 长期建立起来的亲密关系

sentences.en: Come along, lad. Time for you to get home.
sentences.cn: 来吧，小伙子。你该回家了。

sentences.en: Customers have only a limited amount of time to examine the goods.
sentences.cn: 顾客只有有限的时间可以检查商品。

sentences.en: Do you remember the time I hit Tom Benson?
sentences.cn: 你还记得那次我打汤姆•本森的事吗？

sentences.en: Einstein changed the way we think about space and time.
sentences.cn: 爱因斯坦改变了我们的时空概念。

sentences.en: he had no time for anything except essays and projects.
sentences.cn: 除了文章和课题外，他没时间做别的事。

sentences.en: He lost two stone in weight during his time there.
sentences.cn: 他在那儿的时候体重下降了2英石。

sentences.en: he took the stairs two at a time.
sentences.cn: 他两步一跨冲上楼梯。

sentences.en: He's touring South America at this moment in time.
sentences.cn: 他此刻正在南美旅游观光。

sentences.en: His most prized time, though, will be spent quietly on his farm.
sentences.cn: 不过，他最宝贵的时光将在自己的农场里平静地度过。

sentences.en: I wouldn't give him the time of day if I could help it.
sentences.cn: 要是我有办法就不会让他好过。

sentences.en: Isn't it about time that you pulled your finger out?
sentences.cn: 现在到了你该赶紧动起来的时候了吧？

sentences.en: It was time now to show more political realism.
sentences.cn: 现在是拿出更多政治务实精神的时候了。

sentences.en: it's about time I came clean and admitted it.
sentences.cn: 我早该招供承认这件事。

sentences.en: Mary had seen the film many times.
sentences.cn: 玛丽已看过这部电影许多次。

sentences.en: Mitchel's schedule had not permitted him to take time off.
sentences.cn: 米切尔的日程安排使他无法休假。

sentences.en: Now is the time to touch him for a loan.
sentences.cn: 现在是向他借笔钱的时候了。

sentences.en: Oh no. Look at the time. I’ll be late.
sentences.cn: 哦，坏了，你看都几点了。我要迟到了。

sentences.en: she didn't have the time to look very closely.
sentences.cn: 她没时间仔细看。

sentences.en: That was the only time we disagreed.
sentences.cn: 那是我们唯一一次意见有分歧。

sentences.en: The French, who led 21-3 at half time, scored eight tries.
sentences.cn: 上半场以21：3领先的法国队有8个达阵得分。

sentences.en: the video has sold 30,000 copies in no time.
sentences.cn: 这部录像很快销了三万套。

sentences.en: We were in the same college, which was male-only at that time.
sentences.cn: 我们那时在同一所学院，当时只招男生。

sentences.en: You are welcome to visit the hospital at any time.
sentences.cn: 你可以随时来医院。

words.tran_cn: 永恒的；不受时间影响的；不合时宜的
计时员；钟表；工作时间记录员
永恒，不朽；不受时间影响
[电子] 定时器；计时器；计时员，记时员；跑表；延时调节器
合拍；为…安排时间；记录…的时间（time的过去分词）
为…安排时间；测定…的时间（time的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 想法太超前的，思想前卫的

phrases.phrase: give someone the time of day

phrases.tran_cn: 在非工作时间，在业余时间；无偿地
adj. 长期的（持久的）；长时间；好久好久
在未来的某时， 一段时间；一些时间；经过若干时间

trans.tran_en: the thing that is measured in minutes, hours, days, years etc using clocks

trans.tran_cn: 计时；测定…的时间；安排…的速度
trans.tran_en: to arrange that something should happen at a particular time

trans.tran_cn: 为…安排时间，测定…的时间，调准（机械的）速度，拨准（钟、表）的快慢
